/usr/bin/c++   -g -pedantic -Wall -std=c++0x    CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/spotlight_test.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/SpotlightRenderer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/glut_utilities.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/BaseRenderer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/Vector4.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/Matrix4.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/Camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/Image.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/ObjUtilities.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/Heightmap.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/libtwodee/Log.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/libtwodee/MessagedException.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/libtwodee/ShaderProgram.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/libtwodee/Utilities.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/libtwodee/UtilitiesOpenGL.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/libtwodee/VertexArray.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spotlight_test.dir/libtwodee/VertexAttributes.cpp.o  -o spotlight_test -rdynamic -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lGLEW -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext
